org.nzdis.micro

Interface Group

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Role

    public interface Group
extends Role
    Role representing a Group. This role is used to locate Roles and Agents based on the appropriate types of Roles and Intents.

    Group.java
    Created: Wed Mar 14 12:07:01 2001
    Version:
    $Revision: 2.0 $ $Date: 2011/06/14 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Mariusz Nowostawski (Original author), Christopher Frantz (Revision author)

    • Method Detail

      • findAgentNamesByRoleType

        java.lang.String[] findAgentNamesByRoleType(java.lang.Class roleType,
                                            boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating agents. This method will prepare a list of all valid agents' names who implement a specific role type. Note, that if an actual role implements a subrole of a specified role, it will be returned as well via the default group implementation mechanism. However, the developer can implement this behaviour otherwise.
        Parameters:
        aRoleType - specification of the requested role
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        Array of all valid agent names for a given specification

      • findAgentNamesByRoleTypeNonRecursive

        java.lang.String[] findAgentNamesByRoleTypeNonRecursive(java.lang.Class roleType,
                                                        boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating roles. Same as findAgentNamesByRoleType() but does not search recursively through sub-groups (levels).
        Parameters:
        aRoleType - specification of the requested role (in the given group)
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        Array of all valid agent names for a given specification

      • findAgentsByRoleType

        Agent[] findAgentsByRoleType(java.lang.Class roleType,
                             boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating agents. This method will prepare a list of all valid agents who implement a specific role type. Note, that if an actual role implements a subrole of a specified role, it will be returned as well via the default group implementation mechanism. However, the developer can implement this behaviour otherwise.
        Parameters:
        aRoleType - specification of the requested role
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        Array of all valid agents for a given specification

      • findAgentsByRoleTypeNonRecursive

        Agent[] findAgentsByRoleTypeNonRecursive(java.lang.Class roleType,
                                         boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating roles. Same as findAgentsByRoleType() but does not search recursively through sub-groups (levels).
        Parameters:
        aRoleType - specification of the requested role (in the given group)
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        Array of all valid agent names for a given specification

      • findRolesByType

        Role[] findRolesByType(java.lang.Class aRoleType,
                       boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating roles. This method will prepare a list of all valid roles implementing a specific role type. Note, that if an actual role implements a subrole of a specified role, it will be returned as well via the default group implementation mechanism. However, the developer can implement this behaviour otherwise.
        Parameters:
        aRoleType - specification of the requested role
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        an array of all valid roles for a given specification

      • findRolesByTypeNonRecursive

        Role[] findRolesByTypeNonRecursive(java.lang.Class aRoleType,
                                   boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating roles. Same as findRolesByType() but does not search recursively through sub-groups (levels).
        Parameters:
        aRoleType - specification of the requested role (in the given group)
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        Array of all valid roles for a given specification

      • findAgentsByIntent

        Agent[] findAgentsByIntent(java.lang.Class anIntentType,
                           boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating agents. This method will prepare a list of all valid agents which can achieve a specified intent recursively throughout all sub-groups of this group.
        Parameters:
        anIntentType - specification of the requested intent
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        Array of all valid agents for a given intent specification

      • findAgentsByIntentNonRecursive

        Agent[] findAgentsByIntentNonRecursive(java.lang.Class anIntentType,
                                       boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating agents. This method will prepare a list of all valid agents which can achieve a specified intent - BUT ONLY in this group, not in subgroups (Alternative: findAgentsByIntent()).
        Parameters:
        anIntentType - specification of the requested intent
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        an array of all valid agents for a given intent specification

      • findRolesByIntent

        Role[] findRolesByIntent(java.lang.Class intentType,
                         boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating roles. This method will prepare a list of all working roles which can process a specified intent recursively throughout all sub-groups of this group.
        Parameters:
        anIntentType - specification of the requested intent
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        Array of all roles that can process a given intent specification

      • findRolesByIntentNonRecursive

        Role[] findRolesByIntentNonRecursive(java.lang.Class intentType,
                                     boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
        Lookup method for locating roles. This method will prepare a list of all working roles which can process a specified intent - BUT ONLY in this group, not in subgroups (Alternative: findRolesByIntent()).
        Parameters:
        anIntentType - specification of the requested intent
        includeGroupOwnerInSearch - indicates if group owner is to be included in lookup
        Returns:
        Array of all roles that can process a given intent specification

      • findAgentByName

        Agent findAgentByName(java.lang.String name)
        Finds agent by name in this group (not across other groups).
        Parameters:
        name - Agent name to be looked up
        Returns:

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        Indicates if group is initialized with agent.
        Returns:

      • reregister

        void reregister(Agent anAgent)
        Registers given agent with this group and deregisters it from old group.
        Parameters:
        anAgent - Agent to be reregistered

      • registerRoleForAgent

        void registerRoleForAgent(Agent agent,
                          Role role)
        Registers role for agents after their initialization.
        Parameters:
        agent - Sgent to register role for
        role - Role to be registered for agent

      • updateRoleIntentIndex

        void updateRoleIntentIndex()
        Reindexes all role-intent assignments for agents. This might be necessary when deleting intents from roles (or introducing the ability to remove roles from agents).

      • getAgents

        Agent[] getAgents()
        Returns all the agents registered within this group.
        Returns:
        Array of all registered agents

      • getAgentsRecursive

        Agent[] getAgentsRecursive()
        Returns all sub-agents in a recursive manner down to the leaves of the hierarchy.
        Returns:
        Array of all registered agents

      • getAgentLoader

        AgentLoader getAgentLoader()
        Returns an agent loader for this group (to add further agents to this group).
        Returns:
        AgentLoader for this group.

      • sendGroupcast

        void sendGroupcast(MicroMessage message)
        Sends a given message to all members of the group.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be passed to all agents

      • getGroupName

        java.lang.String getGroupName()
        Returns group's name.
        Returns:
        Group name
